page_content: The page discusses travel recommendations for the Zibelemärit event in Bern, focusing on public transportation.
The page provides information on high traffic expected due to a Rammstein concert in Bern and recommends using public transportation.
The page discusses the establishment of emergency meeting points in the Canton of Bern for use during disasters and emergencies.
The page reports an incident at a school in Thun where an intoxicated man harassed a teacher.
The page discusses noise reduction measures along the Brünigstrasse in Hausen bei Meiringen.
The page provides detailed information on road signs, markings, and signaling regulations in the Canton of Bern.
